text: [MUSIC PLAYING]
Hello, this is Sarah Lucas.

I'm here to walk you
through the post-MBA goals
section of our application.

At first glance, this is either
pretty straightforward for you
or entirely daunting.

We know that you come to a place
like Harvard Business School

to gain skills and
knowledge, but also

to explore career alternatives
or build on your current career
path.

In our application
at this point,

we are not expecting a
perfectly laid-out plan

that you will
never deviate from.

What we are looking for
here is an understanding

of where you believe you want
to go after HBS, short term
and possibly longer term.
What do you hope for?
What are your aspirations?

The post-MBA goals may
be a short section,

but there's a lot
of self-reflection

that goes into coming
up with a response here.

What drives you to
want to come to HBS?

Why is this next step in your
journey so important to you

in terms of the career path
you would like to be on?

Answers to these questions
should drive your response.

Finally, there's no
right answer here

in terms of any particular path
we value more than another.

In this section,
we are just looking

for post-MBA goals that are
authentic to your individual
experience and aspirations.

For more information, visit
our application process page.
And good luck.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
